briefTitle: To Evaluate Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Versus Atorvastatin in Patients With High Cholesterol Not Controlled on Atorvastatin 40 mg (0653-090)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Rand., Double-Blind, Titration Study to Evaluate & Compare the Efficacy & Safety of Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Vs Atorvastatin in Hypercholesterolemic Pts. at High Risk for CHD Not Adequately Controlled on Atorvastatin 40 Mg
summary: To Evaluate and Compare the Efficacy and Safety of Ezetimibe Plus Atorvastatin Versus Atorvastatin in Hypercholesterolemic Patients at High Risk for Coronary Heart Disease Not Adequately Controlled on Atorvastatin 40 mg.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline to Week 6 in Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL)-C
